pr_title: Add Avro key serialization / deserialization support for Kafka module

timeline.message: Arrange send functions into separtate classes byte value type
Add avro key deserialization to consumers
Separate avro dependencies from the others

timeline.bodyText: Shall we revisit this function names? It bit difficult to get the idea that what this does by looking at the code?
timeline.author: wggihan

replies.author: ThisaruGuruge

replies.bodyText:
IMO,  one of the most important factor is the readability of the code. We should able to read this even in the non-IDE situation. My suggestion is to go further and change to something like
sendByteArrayValueAndByteArrayKey() if possible.
replies.author: wggihan

timeline.bodyText: Shall we try to return ErrorValue here?
timeline.author: wggihan

replies.bodyText: This method is to just populate the consumer record. Ideally, this line of code shouldn't be reached. Also, this is called inside a resource invocation. Hence, I think throwing this is appropriate.
replies.author: ThisaruGuruge

replies.bodyText: Both are extending from RuntimeException. But behaviour is different.  What is the behaviour getting if this throws this?
replies.author: wggihan

replies.bodyText:
This method is called from both the poll() function and the resource. If this line is hit when the poll is called, this will panic. If this is hit through the resource, this will log the error, and will continue.
But as I said, ideally, this wouldn't be reached until a user provides an incorrect configuration.
I will change this to ErrorValue anyways.
replies.author: ThisaruGuruge

replies.bodyText: Sometimes back there was a discussion about this throwing error whether it ErrorValue or BRuntime*. I couldn't remember now. @hasithaa @pubudu91 Any comment about what to use here?
replies.author: wggihan
